attributes.action: Ensure a safe walking route or free transport is available for Perton children.
attributes.background: For many, many years the heavily trafficked walking route between Perton and Codsall High School in Wolverhampton has been is dangerous disrepair with disintegrated pavements and lacks essential safe crossing points across the 50mph A41 and Heath House Lane. We need a safe route or free transport.

rejection.details:
This petition concerns a matter which is the responsibility of Staffordshire County Council:
https://www.staffordshire.gov.uk
